indicator_name: 최빈개도국을 포함한 개도국을 위한 투자촉진제도를 채택하고 이행하는 국가의 수

en.target_name: Adopt and implement investment promotion regimes for least developed countries
en.computation_definitions:
Data unavailable (Type4)
There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
en.indicator_name: Number of countries that adopt and implement investment promotion regimes for developing countries, including LDCs
en.indicator_definition: Investment promotion regimes are defined as legitimate instruments that directly aim at encouraging foreign investment through particular measures of the home or host countries of investment.
en.global_indicator_name: Number of countries that adopt and implement investment promotion regimes for developing countries, including LDCs
en.title: Untitled
